result.execSummary:
The defendant Dorothy T Goodloe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession, Use of Marijuana or Synthetic Marijuana. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25 per month.  2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Possession, Use of Marijuana or Synthetic Marijuana
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Plea/sentencing hearing on August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dorothy T Goodloe in court with attorney John William Campion.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Parties have come to an agreement on resolution of the cases.

Parties are requesting a status date out to August.
ZCI report should be completed prior to the next status date.
Def is moving to w/draw from the matters today, someone else from the office will be taking the cases.
BTC: Motion to w/draw is granted, Matter adjourned. Deft must make payment arrangements with ZCI.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dorothy T Goodloe in court with attorney John William Campion.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Matter is scheduled for review of bond on the Court's Motion.
Deft has picked up new file.
State would not address bond in this file but rather in the new file.
BTC: Matter adjourned.
Bail/bond hearing on May 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.
Status conference on May 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Dorothy T Goodloe in court.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
